html: Updates from @fema conference call: -U.S. Water Service estimates Lumber River in Lumberton is currently 23.7 feet. Expect some receding, but then river to rise again to approximately 24.5 feet this weekend.
text:
Updates from @fema conference call:

-U.S. Water Service estimates Lumber River in Lumberton is currently 23.7 feet.  Expect some receding, but then river to rise again to approximately 24.5 feet this weekend.

html: Updates from @fema conference call: -The river gauge in Lumberton is out of service because water levels are too high. I have asked for update on when service will be restored - basically, it won't happen until staff can safely access the site.
text:

-The river gauge in Lumberton is out of service because water levels are too high.  I have asked for update on when service will be restored - basically, it won't happen until staff can safely access the site.
